_header: O vir bought dear dum viuis think on the bier

BodDig88.Transcription:
O vir boght dere dum viuis thenk on the bereDico
                        tibi vere non sine fine thow shalt be here

BodHolkM39.Transcription:
O vir dere bowt dum viuis thynk on yDico tibi vere
                        sine fine you schalt not be here
